subject: Football
lead_paragraph: With Brian Hoyer out and T. J. Yates injured on a scramble, Weeden carried Houston to its first win at Indianapolis in the team’s history and into the A.F.C. South lead.
snippet: With Brian Hoyer out and T. J. Yates injured on a scramble, Weeden carried Houston to its first win at Indianapolis in the team’s history and into the A.F.C. South lead.
